text: Alida Helena "Hummie" van der Tonnekreek (16 April 1945 â€“ 19 January 2022) was a Dutch journalist and editor. Van der Tonnekreek started working as an editor at Margriet, but later she made career as a reporter at the gossip magazine . She then worked for a short time at and finally was editor-in-chief at and AvantGarde, where she left after a conflict in 1998. Van der Tonnekreek became known to the public when she became editor-in-chief of the television series Big Brother in 1999. She was the all editions editor-in-chief untill Big Brother 6 in 2006. She was also editor-in-chief of the reality series , and Hotel Big Brother. In 2011, she was involved as a consultant on the Big Brother spin-off Secret Story. Van der Tonnekreek had lung cancer She died in Hillegom on 19 January 2022, at the age of 76. ==References== Category:Dutch journalists Category:Editors Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Amsterdam
title: Hummie van der Tonnekreek
